abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The larva mage's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: eldritch blast (3 beams, +3 bonus to each damage roll), minor illusion
* 3/day: dominate monster
* 1/day: circle of death

abilities.name: Return to Worms.
abilities.description: When the larva mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a swarm of insects in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the larva mage reforms from it 24 hours later.
